Reviews.Title: Beautiful Images
Reviews.Author: Rachel Farfsing
Reviews.Content: This camera takes beautiful pictures. The quality of the pictures are clear, bright, and focused. This camera can be used for close up shots that are in focus, and faraway shots that capture the whole scene. The camera has different modes designed for novice photographers to seasoned ones. There is also a video mode with sound capabilities. The camera also comes with a stylus to use when viewing your images, as well as a fun picture frame option. This camera is well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: mydiva129
Reviews.Content: this camera is great. the picture quality is awsome. me and my girlfriends went to cancun and one of the ladies had this camera and out of all the cameras we had this one had the sharpest and clearest pitures. about 4 of us came back and ordered this camera. this is my second order of this someone stole the first one. the touch screen is great. it has a lot of bells and whistles. love it love it love it

Reviews.Title: EXCELENT
Reviews.Author: Carlo G. Lazcano Marquez "CALAMA"
Reviews.Content: LA CÁMARA ES EXCELENTE, SI SABES APROVECHAR SUS FUNCIONES NO LE FALTA NADA, EL FORMATO DE WIDESCREEN ESTÁ MUY BIEN SI QUIERES VER TUS FOTOS EN LA TV DE ALTA DEFINICIÓN.
